page.title: 12Chorleywood Resident's Diet
page.content: *** Richard Swan's Daily Menu *** {Breakfast:}Orange juice, muesli/cereal milk, brown sugar,toast, butter,honey. {Lunch: Weekday:}cheese/ham sandwiches {Sunday:}roast lamb, beef,or chicken, carrots, potatoes, beans, fruit salad. {Tea:}Milkshake,cake,bread/butter,honey {Supper:}Weekday: cold meat and salad or meat and vegetable casserole apple-crumble with ice_cream.{Sunday: fish cakes, bacon & eggs, sweetcorn. **** Where food is bought **** {Chorleywood Supermarket:}muesli, honey ham, cornflakes, brown_sugar, cheese milkshake, ice_cream. {Chorleywood Butcher:}Lamb,Beef,chicken bacon,eggs. {Milkman:}milk,butter. {Rickmansworth Bejam:}sweetcorn fishcakes, orange-juice, peas, beans {Croxley Green James Evert:}apples carrots, potatoes,bananas. {Chalfont St Peter bread shop:} bread.
